EmailTemplate.description: Email to send when opportunity becomes closed won
EmailTemplate.name: Closed Won Opportunity Email Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.Name} is Closed Won!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Team,
This is to inform you that opportunity, '{!Opportunity.Name}' from account '{!Opportunity.Account}', has been closed won. Please reach out to opportunity owner, '{!Opportunity.OwnerFullName}', if needed.
CRM link for the opportunity record: {!Opportunity.Link}
Thank you!
